attributes.action: Have Robert Mugabe Exiled From Zimbabwe...Procecuted By The UN For His Crimes on  the Zimbabwein People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Have enough signatures to give to Mr Gordon Brown, to take action againist Mr Mugabe, so that he will be trial before a board of members from the United Nation or a judge and jury of another country for the crimes he has commited including the recent imtimidation and captial punishiment tactics. He needs to face up to what he has committed and justice needs to be served!

rejection.details: There are a number of similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=mugabe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=ban+religion&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
